Welcome to pyCommonStuff’s documentation!¶

Contents:

Some common Python Patterns

class pyCommonStuff.pathFileExtracts¶

Extract file names and path from pathfilenames

extractFilenameFromPathfilename(fullPathFilename)¶

Extract fileName without extension from pathfullPathName

extractFilenameNoextFromPathfilename(fullPathFilename)¶

Extract fileName from pathfullPathName

extractPathFromPathfilename(fullPathFilename)¶

Extract Path from fullPathFilename

testExtracts()¶

Test Code

class pyCommonStuff.CheckFreshness¶

Check to see if the file was saved today. Ignores midnight

isFresh(pathFileName)¶

Check to see if a file is fresh (shares the same date as today) Uses global freshnessCheck

Parameters:pathFileName – Pathfilename to check
Returns:True if the date matches today’s date, false otherwise
class pyCommonStuff.XMLtoList¶

XMLtoList class reads the XML file into a list

readSpreadsheetXML2List(inFileN)¶

returns list which contains the XML spreadsheet data

class pyCommonStuff.writeOutToCSVFile¶

writing out a CSV file

doWriteOut(outFileName, theOutList)¶

Calls the other function which do the write out of the CSV file

Parameters:
  • outFileName – string which has the pathfilename
  • theOutList – the list to write out
openCSVFile(csvName)¶

Open the CSV file for output.

Parameters:csvName – the name of the file as a string
sortMyList(inList)¶

sorting a list

Parameters:inList – The list to sort
Returns:the sorted list
writeOutCsvBody(theOutList, outFileName)¶

write out the CSV body

Parameters:
  • theOutList – list that needs to be written out
  • outFileName – string that has the pathfilename
